channel.title: What anti-vir should I get?
channel.description: Okay,I've seen mixed feelings about all virus scanners.. And I need for you people out there to pick between...(all pay versions) NOD32 Kaspersky Bitdefender --- I only want 1 scanner,my comp doesn't have the best RAM :| So,vote.

item.title: What anti-vir should I get?
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Norton is the WORST hogs way to much resources, can’t scan for shit, and also costs like $60-70 USD unless you use torrents, which by the way I do. Kaspersky pwns all and is for somewhat advanced users. Kaspersky also specializes in trojan detection and can literally scan and identify every trojan you give it!

Read full topic

item.description:
@x_h_3_ll_1_s_h_x wrote:

AVG anti-virus FREE

its great, better than norton AND FREEE!

it works wonders for me.

spybot search&destroy is very reliable for spyware etc.

Read full topic

item.title: What anti-vir should I get?
item.dc:creator: @AnthraX_Leader AnthraX Leader
item.description:
@AnthraX_Leader wrote:

Norten sucks when it comes to viruses I have norten and all norten does is PREVENT viruses but ounce you get a virus your well ****** all norten basicly does is quarentine everything and blocks everything so its basicly useless good for prevention but stops all programs that use internet and if you want them to use internet then norten cant help you thus no reason to have it. Symetretic antivirus in my opinion is best to actually illiminate viruses.

Read full topic

item.title: What anti-vir should I get?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:12, topic:5173”][quote author=poopy4231 link=topic=6773.msg70324#msg70324 date=1153187866]
Actually, norton is the best anti-virus out, many people think its bad for its easy-to-use interface. You take a look at kaspersky and it has a shitty looking interface, and you could be doing things that you dont know what your setting on there. Norton is the best anti-virus, why most idiots say that norton sucks, is because of its easy-to-use interface. Well thats actually better than the shitty looks of kaspersky… And the only bad thing about norton is that takes up a lot of memory. So you know-it-all people shut up and dont say that it sucks, cause its the best one out. If you say norton sucks, your wrong its a very powerful anti-virus
[/quote]
I have norton, it’s good…
But he said that he needs a virus scanner for a low RAM computer, thus NOD32 is the best option.[/quote]

I have Norton as well, its awesome! But I had it on my old computer with low RAM, and that computer turned to shit.

Read full topic

So you know-it-all people shut up and dont say that it sucks, cause its the best one out. If you say norton sucks, your wrong its a very powerful anti-virus

I have norton, it’s good…
But he said that he needs a virus scanner for a low RAM computer, thus NOD32 is the best option.
